ygData.subject: Re: players getting charmed
ygData.msgSnippet: my friend and I BOTH got charmed...at the SAME TIME yesterday in Toxxulia forest by some Necro near the tunnel entrance waaaaayyyy back inside.......he
ygData.messageBody:
my friend and I BOTH got charmed...at the SAME TIME yesterday in
Toxxulia forest by some Necro near the tunnel entrance waaaaayyyy back
inside.......he appeared upset that we had killed off his two guarding
skeletons...he cursed at them and said he wondered why he ever bothered to
ressurect them in the first place....we ran back and forth for about 3
minutes....it was hilarious...charm wore off..and on the way back to Erudin,
some necro at the fishing dock and his pet....began casting all sorts of
nasty spells on me....I tried to run...but was dead in no time...

there are A LOT of necros in that forrest, I've found out...but
nothing worth hunting.....at least not at my level 10...




From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...> on 05/03/99 11:33
AM PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: players getting charmed

From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>

*Yes, once my evil necro was charmed by Lady Shae in freeport
*and went around
*whacking everyone in sight til the charm wore off and Lady
*Shae killed him.

Holy crap, that blows away my "being charmed" story.
